name: European Arthroplasty Register Network
goal:
EARN is a voluntary network of experts in the field of outcome research, particularly registries and other real world big data.
EARN members consent to support regulatory purposes and public health goals in a transparent way.
EARN members support to develop and implement best practice in quality monitoing of medical devices (particularly in orthopaedics and arthroplasty) in the entire EU and beyond.
euInitiatives: Medical Device Regulation and associated Guidance Documents, JRC Activities, IMDRF, Research activities of any kind related to Registries/Real World Evidence/Market Surveillance on Medical Devices
